B

Bill - Class in Model.Card
This class represents the Mail Card Bill
Bill(String, String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class Model.Card.Bill
Constructor: Constructs a new Bill Card with the given name, message, choice, Money_C and image
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Bill Card with the given name, message, choice,Money_C and image.
Board - Class in Model.Position
This Class Contains the Array for all the Positions on the Board
Board() - Constructor for class Model.Position.Board
Constructor: Constructs a new Board object with an Array Board_Position that includes all the position of the Board
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Board object with an Array Board_Position that includes all the position of the Board.
BoardGUI - Class in View
 
BoardGUI(Board, Player, Player, Pack_of_cards) - Constructor for class View.BoardGUI
Constructor: Constructs a new Board frame and puts all the necessary Panels
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Board frame and puts in specific order all the Panels (background,logo,board,Player1,infobox,Player2) and all the Labels,images and text that go above them.
Buyer - Class in Model.Position
This class represents the Buyer Position
Buyer(String, String, String) - Constructor for class Model.Position.Buyer
Constructor: Constructs a new Buyer Position with the given name, message and image.
